catalog_info.title: Tutorial - Senior Year
catalog_info.notes: Hours to be arranged.   Taught by Thomas Cummins and members of the Department. Required of honors candidates in History of Art and Architecture. Permission of the Head Tutor required.
catalog_info.description: In the fall term, HAA 99 includes several group tutorial meetings with the senior honors adviser, where assignments are aimed at facilitating the writing of a senior honors thesis; spring term consists of independent writing, under the direction of the individual thesis adviser. Part two of a two part series.
